ch.uzh.agglorecommender.recommender

Class Recommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.recommender.Recommender

  • public final class Recommender
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates different recommendations based on a given tree structure A test of the rmse value of the recommendation can be run by runTestRecommendation() A recommendation of movies a user has not yet rated can be run by runRecommendation()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Recommender

        public Recommender(Searcher searcher)
        Instantiates a new recommendation builder which can give recommendations based on a given tree structure
        Parameters:
        clusterResult - the trees on which the recommendation calculation is done
        testDataset -
        radiusU - indicates the number of levels that should be incorporated from user tree
        radiusC - indicates the number of levels that should be incorporated from content tree

      • recommend

        public java.util.Map<INode,IAttribute> recommend(INode position,
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> watched)
        Collect all the content that should be recommended based on given user and radius
        Parameters:
        position - starting point to calculate recommendation
        watched - list of dataset items the user has already rated

      • rankRecommendation

        public java.util.SortedMap<INode,IAttribute> rankRecommendation(java.util.Map<INode,IAttribute> unsortedRecommendation,
                                                       int direction,
                                                       int limit)
        Sorts the recommendation with an insertion sort and returns the movies which the user would most likely rate the best respectively the worst depending on the sorting parameter. the number of returned recommendations depends on the limit parameter.
        Parameters:
        unsortedRecommendation - the unsorted recommendation
        direction - defines if best or worst recommendations are returned (1=best,0=worst)
        limit - defines the number of returned recommendations

      • printRecommendation

        public void printRecommendation(java.util.SortedMap<INode,IAttribute> recommendationCollection)
